paleoftheancients:BurnKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Burned creatures take more damage from all attacks equal to the amount of #rBurn on them. NL When the stack of #rBurn passes a multiple of 4, apply 1 #bWeak. NL On monsters, #rBurn is halved at the end of turn.

paleoftheancients:StackedKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Numbers are reduced by the amount of cards in the drawpile.
